        public void doConvert(org.kohsuke.stapler.StaplerRequest request,

               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Handles submit action of convert button.
        Parameters:
        request - StaplerRequest object from the form.
        response - StaplerResponse object that re-directs to newly created job.
        Throws:

        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.
